### Load packages and data

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
```

```{r load-data, message=FALSE}
nobel <- read_csv("data/nobel.csv")
```

## Exercises

### Exercise 1
```{r data-glimpse}
glimpse(nobel)
```
There is one row for each laureate. 26 variables and 935 observations.

### Exercise 2
```{r nobel-living}
nobel_living <- nobel %>% 
  filter(
    gender != "org", 
    country != "NA", 
    is.na(died_date)
    )

glimpse(nobel_living)
```
